content-1.content: The Memorandum of Agreement was signed by the Polytechnic University of the Philippines (PUP) officials and Abo Akademi University representative Dr. Peter Nynas. It was attended by the Dean of the College of Social Sciences and Development, Dr. Raul Roland Sebastian. Department of Psychology Chair Asst. Prof. Lorraine Charmayne Manansala- Enriquez, Chairpersons from CSSD and The Office of International Affairs Officials.

content-2.content: The Memorandum of Agreement was signed by the Polytechnic University of the Philippines (PUP) officials and Abo Akademi University representative Dr. Peter Nynas. It was attended by the Dean of the College of Social Sciences and Development, Dr. Raul Roland Sebastian. Department of Psychology Chair Asst. Prof. Lorraine Charmayne Manansala- Enriquez, Chairpersons from CSSD and The Office of International Affairs Officials.

content-3.content: PUP and AAU encourages academic exchange and collaboration to advance teaching and research in their respective institutions. Now therefore, for and in consideration of the foregoing premises and of the terms and conditions both universities have mutually agreed to have an exchange of online lectures, collaboration in research projects, conduct of webinars, conferences, talk shows, and other related activities, Exchange of academic materials, publications, data and information.

content-4.content: PUP and AAU encourages academic exchange and collaboration to advance teaching and research in their respective institutions. Now therefore, for and in consideration of the foregoing premises and of the terms and conditions both universities have mutually agreed to have an exchange of online lectures, collaboration in research projects, conduct of webinars, conferences, talk shows, and other related activities, Exchange of academic materials, publications, data and information.

content-5.content: Chandigarh University invited Prof. Jonna Karla C. Bien and Prof. Felicitas Trinidad from the College of Social Sciences and Development, Department of Psychology to be part of the International Faculty Development Program held in Chandigarh University, India last July 4-8, 2022.

content-6.content: Chandigarh University invited Prof. Jonna Karla C. Bien and Prof. Felicitas Trinidad from the College of Social Sciences and Development, Department of Psychology to be part of the International Faculty Development Program held in Chandigarh University, India last July 4-8, 2022.

content-7.content: “Isko at Iska: Thinking Out of the Box, Thinking Global!” A Proposed Internationalization Program for Faculty Members and Students The Polytechnic University of the Philippines Initiated by the Department of Psychology, College of Social Sciences and Development recognizes the importance to further enhance its academic services as it take a leap in strengthening its international image and reputation. As it goes global, it aims to integrate an intercultural dimension into teaching, learning, research and service functions in response to the changing national and international Higher Education Environment particularly during this time of pandemic.

content-8.content: “Isko at Iska: Thinking Out of the Box, Thinking Global!” A Proposed Internationalization Program for Faculty Members and Students The Polytechnic University of the Philippines Initiated by the Department of Psychology, College of Social Sciences and Development recognizes the importance to further enhance its academic services as it take a leap in strengthening its international image and reputation. As it goes global, it aims to integrate an intercultural dimension into teaching, learning, research and service functions in response to the changing national and international Higher Education Environment particularly during this time of pandemic.

content-9.content: United People Global and Polytechnic University of the Philippines conducted a webinar about Sustainable Development Goals. The Department of Psychology Faculty Members as the invited speaker discussed SDG’s number 3,4 and 5 as part of the agreed activities on the academic exchange and collaboration to advance teaching and research in their respective institutions. Attended by the PUP Faculty members and Students.
